ygData.subject: Re: Hail all
ygData.msgSnippet: I prefer OOC, actually, as I look at this list as a source of information, and a place where I can ask questions and get frank, honest answers.  But if someone
ygData.messageBody:
I prefer OOC, actually, as I look at this list as a source of information,
and a place where I can ask questions and get frank, honest answers. But
if someone puts a roleplayed story or something on the list, I'll also read
it with enthusiasm.

- Flik



At 01:06 PM 4/16/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Saleen <saleengt@...>
>
>I have no problem with ooc stuff. I setup the list initially for wiz's to
>share really any aspect of
>this game, ideally it posts should have something to do with Wiz's in
>general but off topic stuff
>about quests, gameplay etc ... i personally don't mind. However i don't
>want to force my opinions
>down everyone's throat so if someone has any valid reasons why this
>shouldn't be the case
>feel free to voice your opinions.
>
>
>
>At 04:19 PM 4/16/99 +0000, you wrote:
>>From: zdogg@...
>>
>>Hail everyone I am a Erudite Wizard on the Bristlebane server, I saw this
list
>>and think it is a great idea. Just wondering if this is going to be a
>list for
>>ooc stuff for tips and such or will it be a more in character advice list?
>>Just
>>wondering.
>>
>> Zakrul The Traveler
>> Companion
>> 7th level Wizard
>>
>>Opps: I had hit reply earlier and sent this to just one person, sorry about
>>that, to whoever recieved it I realized my mistake to late. This is my
>fourth
>>mailing list for EQ and it still doesn\'t help the withdrawl while at work.
>>
